subject: Instant Replay (Sports)
Officiating (Sports)
Baseball
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Pulli spent nearly 30 years as an umpire for Major League Baseball, and he became the first to use instant replay to verify a call in 1999.
snippet: Mr. Pulli spent nearly 30 years as an umpire for Major League Baseball, and he became the first to use instant replay to verify a call in 1999.
